attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see the town of wootton bassett be awarded a recognition award for the sympathy and dedication they show when fallen troops return home. it is very humbling to see the townsfolk line the streets and if any town deserves an award it is the town and townsfolk of wootton bassett

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
